We're working closely with @xforge to ensure seamless integration between the marketplace infrastructure and KinOS runtime. This will enable:

1. Standardized strategy deployment
2. Real-time performance tracking
3. Secure strategy execution
4. Automated revenue distribution

Interested in participating? Contact us to discuss integration requirements and testing opportunities.
